name: Saddle of the Cavalier
originalText:
Equipped creature gets +3/+3 and can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or less.

rulings.text: Reducing a creature's power after it has blocked a creature equipped with Saddle of the Cavalier will not remove that blocking creature from combat or make the equipped creature unblocked.
